{{Exclusive|Bedrock|Legacy Console}}

<templatestyles src=":Skin pack capes/styles.css" />

This is a list of [[cape]]s included in [[skin pack]]s on {{BE}}. Unlike regular capes, which can be freely equipped with any skin, skin pack capes can only be equipped with their associated skin. As a result, they are considered separate from standard capes, and statements about capes on this wiki will exclude skin pack capes by default.

Many of these capes' textures do not represent capes in the traditional sense, but rather hair or other accessories represented by using capes with many transparent pixels.

== MINECON skin pack capes ==
{{Exclusive|Bedrock}}
The [[Capes#Physical events|capes from previous MINECON events]] were included in some commemorative skin packs. The MINECON skin packs include only the (outdated) [[Steve]] and [[Alex]] skins, combined with the different MINECON capes. Like other skin pack capes, the capes can only be equipped with their associated skins; as such it is not possible to use this skin pack to equip the capes to a skin that is not Steve or Alex.

=== MINECON 2015 Skin Pack ===
{{main|Minecon 2015 Skin Pack}}
This skin pack includes the [[MINECON 2015]] cape, as well as all capes from previous years' [[MINECON]] events. The skin pack was made available to every {{BE}} player in 2015 regardless of whether they attended any of the events.
